[et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="off" specialty="off" _builder_version="4.27.0" background_color="#0f1419" custom_padding="0px||0px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_row column_structure="1_2,1_2" use_custom_gutter="on" gutter_width="1" make_equal="on" _builder_version="4.27.0" width="100%" max_width="100%" custom_padding="0px||0px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.27.0" background_color="#0f1419" background_image="" custom_padding="100px|60px|100px|60px|true|true" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="#3798E4" text_font_size="13px" text_letter_spacing="2px" header_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_text_color="#ffffff" header_font_size="48px" header_line_height="1.15em" custom_margin="||8px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"]

For Manufacturing Business Owners

Your True Costs Are Invisible.

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.85)" text_font_size="18px" text_line_height="1.7em" custom_margin="||32px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"]

“Shadow Excel” files have replaced your standard operating procedures. Ghost inventory means system says 100, shelf says 50. We fix this—because we’ve spent 44 years doing nothing but manufacturing software.

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_button button_url="/products/" button_text="See How We Fix It" button_alignment="left" _builder_version="4.27.0" custom_button="on" button_text_size="16px" button_text_color="#0f1419" button_bg_color="#3798E4" button_border_width="0px" button_border_radius="8px" button_letter_spacing="0px" button_font="Lexend|600|||||||" custom_padding="16px|32px|16px|32px|true|true" button_bg_color__hover_enabled="on|hover" button_bg_color__hover="#2d7bc4" global_colors_info="{}"] [/et_pb_button] [et_pb_column_inner _builder_version="4.27.0" custom_padding="40px||||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"] [/et_pb_column_inner] [et_pb_number_counter title="Years Manufacturing Focus" number="44" percent_sign="off" _builder_version="4.27.0" title_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" title_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.6)" title_font_size="13px" number_font="Lexend|700|||||||" number_text_color="#3798E4" number_font_size="42px" custom_padding="|16px||16px|false|true" global_colors_info="{}"] [/et_pb_number_counter] [et_pb_number_counter title="Factories Served" number="50000" percent_sign="off" _builder_version="4.27.0" title_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" title_text_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.6)" title_font_size="13px" number_font="Lexend|700|||||||" number_text_color="#3798E4" number_font_size="42px" number_line_height="1.2em" custom_padding="|16px||16px|false|true" global_colors_info="{}"] [/et_pb_number_counter] [/et_pb_column] [et_pb_column type="1_2" _builder_version="4.27.0" background_color="#ffffff" custom_padding="100px|60px|100px|60px|true|true" global_colors_info="{}"] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="#10b981" text_font_size="13px" text_letter_spacing="2px" header_font="Lexend|700|||||||" header_text_color="#253B50" header_font_size="48px" header_line_height="1.15em" custom_margin="||8px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"]

For ERP Implementers

Trapped in the Man-Day Model?

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_text _builder_version="4.27.0" text_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" text_text_color="#64748b" text_font_size="18px" text_line_height="1.7em" custom_margin="||32px||false|false" global_colors_info="{}"]

Your revenue is capped by headcount. Customization wars burn out your best consultants. We offer a way out—product-based margins that compound instead of compress.

[/et_pb_text] [et_pb_button button_url="/partner-program/" button_text="Escape the Trap" button_alignment="left" _builder_version="4.27.0" custom_button="on" button_text_size="16px" button_text_color="#253B50" button_bg_color="rgba(0,0,0,0)" button_border_width="2px" button_border_color="#253B50" button_border_radius="8px" button_letter_spacing="0px" button_font="Lexend|600|||||||" custom_padding="14px|32px|14px|32px|true|true" button_text_color__hover_enabled="on|hover" button_text_color__hover="#3798E4" button_border_color__hover_enabled="on|hover" button_border_color__hover="#3798E4" global_colors_info="{}"] [/et_pb_button] [et_pb_number_counter title="License Margin" number="40" percent_sign="on" _builder_version="4.27.0" title_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" title_text_color="#64748b" title_font_size="13px" number_font="Lexend|700|||||||" number_text_color="#10b981" number_font_size="42px" custom_margin="40px||||false|false" custom_padding="|16px||16px|false|true" global_colors_info="{}"] [/et_pb_number_counter] [et_pb_number_counter title="Recurring Revenue" number="50" percent_sign="on" _builder_version="4.27.0" title_font="Source Sans 3||||||||" title_text_color="#64748b" title_font_size="13px" number_font="Lexend|700|||||||" number_text_color="#10b981" number_font_size="42px" custom_padding="|16px||16px|false|true" global_colors_info="{}"] [/et_pb_number_counter] [/et_pb_column] [/et_pb_row] [/et_pb_section]

info.name: DigiWin Homepage - Section 1: Split Hero
info.description: Two-column hero section. Left: dark panel for factory operators (Track A). Right: white panel for ERP implementers (Track B). Each has label, headline, description, CTA button, and stat counters.
notes: SVG illustrations from the HTML version are NOT included - use placeholder images or add later
Number counters will animate on scroll in DIVI
Fonts: Lexend for headings, Source Sans 3 for body, JetBrains Mono for labels
This section replaces the custom split-screen hero with native DIVI modules
